name: Apple iPhone 12
description: The latest iPhone with a Super Retina XDR display and A14 Bionic chip.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.comment: I love my new iPhone! It's fast and the camera is amazing.

reviews.name: Jane Doe
reviews.comment: The phone is great, but I wish the battery lasted longer.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The latest Samsung smartphone with a stunning display and powerful processor.

reviews.name: Robert Johnson
reviews.comment: This phone is a beast! It can do everything I need and more.

reviews.name: Laura Williams
reviews.comment: I'm happy with my new phone, but the fingerprint sensor is a bit slow.

name: Canon EOS R6
description: A high-performance mirrorless camera with 20 fps continuous shooting and 4K video.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: This camera is a game changer! The image quality is unbeatable.

reviews.name: Emily Davis
reviews.comment: I'm really happy with my new camera, but the menu system is a bit confusing.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: Wireless headphones with active noise cancelling technology and Google Assistant.

reviews.name: David Smith
reviews.comment: These headphones are amazing! The noise cancelling is top-notch and the sound quality is excellent.

reviews.name: Sara Johnson
reviews.comment: I really like these headphones, but the controls are a bit hard to use.

name: Beats Solo Pro Wireless Headphones
description: Wireless headphones with active noise cancelling and up to 22 hours of listening time.

reviews.name: Christopher Jones
reviews.comment: These headphones are amazing! The noise cancelling is top-notch.

reviews.name: Sara Smith
reviews.comment: I really like these headphones, but they are a bit tight on my head.

name: The Alchemist
description: A novel by Paulo Coelho about a shepherd boy's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

reviews.name: James Rodriguez
reviews.comment: This book is life-changing! I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.name: Ashley Johnson
reviews.comment: I enjoyed the book, but I found some parts a bit slow.
